1{-# LANGUAGE PatternSynonyms #-}
2{-# LANGUAGE ScopedTypeVariables #-}
3{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
4
5-- | Running relational calculation.
6
7module Koshucode.Baala.Core.Assert.Run
8  ( runAssertJudges,
9  ) where
10
11import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture              as O
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                  as B
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax                as S
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data                  as D
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Lexmap           as C
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Relkit           as C
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Relmap           as C
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Assert.Assert    as C
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Assert.RelTable  as C
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Message          as Msg
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Assert.Message   as Msg
22
23
24-- ----------------------  Assert
25
26-- | Calculate assertion list.
27runAssertJudges :: (Ord c, D.CContent c, D.SelectRel h, C.GetGlobal h)
28  => h c -> C.Option c -> C.ShortAsserts' h c -> B.Ab (C.ShortResultChunks c)
29runAssertJudges hook opt a =
30    do chunks <- runAssertDataset hook opt a
31       Right $ a { S.shortBody = chunks }
32
33-- | Calculate assertion list.
34runAssertDataset :: forall h. forall c. (Ord c, D.CContent c, D.SelectRel h, C.GetGlobal h)
35  => h c -> C.Option c -> C.ShortAsserts' h c -> B.Ab [C.ResultChunk c]
36runAssertDataset hook option (S.Short _ sh ass) =
37    Right . concat =<< mapM each ass
38    where
39      each (C.Assert _ _ _ _ _ Nothing _) = B.bug "runAssertDataset"
40      each a@(C.Assert _ typ pat _ opt (Just relmap) libs) =
41          Msg.abAssert [a] $ do
42            r1 <- runRelmapViaRelkit hook libs relmap D.reldee
43            let judgeOf showEmpty = assert showEmpty typ
44            optionProcess sh judgeOf pat option opt r1
45
46      assert :: (D.CEmpty c) => Bool -> D.AssertType -> D.JudgeOf c
47      assert True  q p = D.assertAs q p
48      assert False q p = D.assertAs q p . D.omitEmpty
49
50runRelmapViaRelkit :: (D.CContent c, D.SelectRel h, C.GetGlobal h)
51  => h c -> C.RelmapLinkTable' h c
52  -> C.Relmap' h c -> B.AbMap (D.Rel c)
53runRelmapViaRelkit hook links r (D.Rel he1 bo1) =
54    do (kdef, C.Relkit hi2' ho2' f2') <- C.relmapSpecialize hook links [] (Just he1) r
55       let C.Relkit _ mhe2 f2 = C.relkitLink kdef $ C.Relkit hi2' ho2' f2'
56       he2 <- just "unknown relhead" mhe2
57       bo2 <- C.relkitRun hook [] f2 bo1
58       Right $ D.Rel he2 bo2
59    where
60      just :: String -> Maybe a -> B.Ab a
61      just _ (Just h) = Right h
62      just s Nothing  = Msg.adlib s
63
64
65-- ---------------------------------  Options
66
67optionType :: S.ParaSpec String
68optionType = S.paraSpec $ S.paraMin 0 . S.paraOpt
69             [ "empty"     -- show empty filler
70             , "forward"   -- move terms to front
71             , "backward"  -- move terms to rear
72             , "lexical"   -- make terms lexical order
73             , "order"     -- sort list of judges by content
74             , "align"     -- align terms vertically
75             , "table"     -- output relation in tabular format
76             ]
77
78optionProcess :: (Ord c, D.CRel c, B.MixEncode c)
79    => [S.ShortDef] -> (Bool -> D.JudgeOf c) -> D.JudgeClass
80    -> C.Option c -> C.TTreePara
81    -> D.Rel c -> B.Ab [C.ResultChunk c]
82optionProcess sh judgeOf pat option opt r1 =
83    do case S.paraMatch optionType opt of
84         Right _  -> Right ()
85         Left u   -> Msg.unkOption u
86       showEmpty <- S.paraGetSwitch opt "empty"
87       r2 <- optionRelmapResource option r1
88       r3 <- optionRelmapAssert   opt    r2
89       let js  = D.judgesFromRel (judgeOf showEmpty) pat r3
90       comment <- optionComment sh pat opt r3
91       Right [ C.ResultJudge js
92             , C.ResultRel pat r3
93             , C.ResultNote comment ]
94
95optionRelmapResource :: (Ord c, D.CRel c) => C.Option c -> B.AbMap (D.Rel c)
96optionRelmapResource option r1 =
97    Right r1 >>= call optionOrder (C.optionBool "order" option)
98    where call f True  r2 = f [] r2
99          call _ False r2 = Right r2
100
101optionRelmapAssert :: (Ord c, D.CRel c) => C.TTreePara -> B.AbMap (D.Rel c)
102optionRelmapAssert opt r1 =
103    Right r1 >>= call optionForward  "forward"
104             >>= call optionBackward "backward"
105             >>= call optionLexical  "lexical"
106             >>= call optionOrder    "order"
107    where call f name r2 = case S.paraGet opt name of
108                             Right args -> f args r2
109                             Left _     -> Right r2
110
111optionComment :: (D.CRel c, B.MixEncode c) =>
112    [S.ShortDef] -> D.JudgeClass -> C.TTreePara -> D.Rel c -> B.Ab [String]
113optionComment sh p opt r =
114    do optTable <- S.paraGetSwitch opt "table"
115       case optTable of
116         True  -> Right $ title : "" : table
117         False -> Right []
118    where
119      title = "TABLE : " ++ p
120      table = ("  " ++) `map` C.relTableLines sh r
121
122
123-- ---------------------------------  Option "forward" and "backward"
124
125optionForward, optionBackward :: (Ord c) => [S.TTree] -> B.AbMap (D.Rel c)
126optionForward  = optionToward True
127optionBackward = optionToward False
128
129-- | Apply forward and backward option.
130optionToward :: (Ord c) => Bool -> [S.TTree] -> B.AbMap (D.Rel c)
131optionToward dir opt2 r1 =
132    do ns <- D.treesFlatNames opt2
133       towardRel dir ns r1
134
135towardRel :: (Ord c) => Bool -> [S.TermName] -> B.AbMap (D.Rel c)
136towardRel dir ns (D.Rel he1 bo1)
137    | D.newTermsExist pk  = Msg.unkTerm (D.newTerms pk) he1
138    | otherwise           = Right $ D.Rel he2 bo2
139    where
140      pk    = D.termPicker ns he1
141      he2   = D.towardTerms dir pk `D.headMap` he1
142      bo2   = D.towardTerms dir pk `map` bo1
143
144-- | lexical option.
145optionLexical :: (Ord c) => [S.TTree] -> B.AbMap (D.Rel c)
146optionLexical _ = lexicalOrderRel
147
148lexicalOrderRel :: (Ord c) => B.AbMap (D.Rel c)
149lexicalOrderRel rel@(D.Rel he1 _) = towardRel True ns' rel where
150    ns' = B.sort $ D.getTermNames he1
151
152
153-- ---------------------------------  Option "order"
154
155optionOrder :: (Ord c, D.CRel c) => [S.TTree] ->  B.AbMap (D.Rel c)
156optionOrder _ r1 = Right $ relSortDeep r1
157
158relSortDeep :: (Ord c, D.CRel c) => O.Map (D.Rel c)
159relSortDeep = relApply f where
160    f (D.Rel he bo) = D.Rel he $ B.sort bo
161
162relApply :: (D.CRel c) => O.Map (O.Map (D.Rel c))
163relApply f (D.Rel he bo) = f $ D.Rel he $ B.map2 nest bo where
164    nest c | D.isRel c = D.pRel $ relApply f $ D.gRel c
165           | otherwise = c
166
